description: This operation creates a data grant.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the data grant.

parameters.name: GrantDistributionScope
parameters.description: The distribution scope of the data grant.

parameters.name: ReceiverPrincipal
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the data grant receiver.

parameters.name: SourceDataSetId
parameters.description: The ID of the data set used to create the data grant.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to add to the data grant. A tag is a key-value pair. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the data grant.

nested_items.name: SenderPrincipal
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the data grant sender.

nested_items.name: ReceiverPrincipal
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the data grant receiver.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the data grant.

nested_items.name: AcceptanceState
nested_items.description: The acceptance state of the data grant.

nested_items.name: AcceptedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the data grant was accepted.

nested_items.name: EndsAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when access to the associated data set ends.

nested_items.name: GrantDistributionScope
nested_items.description: The distribution scope for the data grant.

nested_items.name: DataSetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the data set associated to the data grant.

nested_items.name: SourceDataSetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the data set used to create the data grant.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the data grant.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data grant.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the data grant was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the data grant was last updated.
